job_tasks.phrase: Maintain and extend our search back-end.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the ongoing development and maintenance of a core software component (the search back-end).

job_tasks.phrase: Design, develop, run and evaluate online AB-tests to improve the quality of the search results.
job_tasks.justification: Designing, developing, and evaluating AB-tests are software development activities focused on improving system performance and user experience.

job_tasks.phrase: Support operational excellence through practices like code review and pair programming
job_tasks.justification: Code review and pair programming are established software development practices that contribute to operational excellence and code quality, falling under operations engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: The entire team is responsible for the operations of our services. This includes actively monitoring different applications and their infrastructure as well as intervening to solve operational problems whenever they arise.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly describes responsibilities related to the operation, monitoring, and troubleshooting of services and infrastructure, which is core to operations engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Keep up with developments in the field of Information Retrieval (e.g. semantic search).
job_tasks.justification: Keeping up with developments in areas like semantic search implies engaging with and potentially implementing advanced modeling techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: Build RAG solutions for editorial domain
job_tasks.justification: Building RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) solutions is a direct application of generative AI modeling techniques.

soft_skills.phrase: Keep up with developments in the field of Information Retrieval
intervening to solve operational problems whenever they arise.

classification.rationale: The job description explicitly mentions building RAG solutions, which is a core responsibility for a GenAI Engineer. The emphasis on semantic search and the use of related technologies like vector databases further supports this classification.
